meanings.definition: Marking with dots or small spots.
meanings.sent1: The dotting pattern on the fabric was very pretty.
meanings.sent2: The artist used dotting techniques to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent3: The dotting design on the cake made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The dotting stars in the sky twinkled brightly at night.
meanings.sent5: The dotting colors on the butterfly wings were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: Adding dots or small spots to something.
meanings.sent1: She was carefully dotting the i's in her handwriting.
meanings.sent2: The baker was dotting the cupcakes with frosting.
meanings.sent3: He was dotting the map with locations of hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: The rain was dotting the window with tiny droplets.
meanings.sent5: The artist was dotting the canvas with paint to create a masterpiece.

meanings.definition: Scattering or placing dots or small spots on something.
meanings.sent1: The child was happily dotting the paper with colorful stickers.
meanings.sent2: She was dotting the garden path with flower petals.
meanings.sent3: The chef was dotting the plate with sauce before serving.
meanings.sent4: The rain was dotting the ground with puddles after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The artist was dotting the mural with tiny details to bring it to life.
